Package sprites

Class MageFactory

java.lang.Object
sprites.EnemyFactory
sprites.MageFactory
public class MageFactory extends EnemyFactory
MageFactory will load the Mage images and create Mage instances using the createEnemy function. Testing is found in Enemy.java.

      public Enemy createEnemy(int x, int y)
      Description copied from class: EnemyFactory

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      x - upper-left x coordinate of the enemy.
